feed.title: auto-mcs Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for auto-mcs: v2.2.2
entry.content:
Welcome to auto-mcs v2.2.2! This version is a quality of life and stability overhaul from v2.2.1. Some of the new features include:

  • Added a search bar in both the Add-on & Script Manager
  • Added Discord rich presence
  • Added a button to change the server icon with any image
  • Major Telepath stability improvements
  • Upgrades to amscript, and improvements to the IDE
  • Bugfixes and security enhancements

I am grateful to the community who has helped to improve this project with either suggestions, provided testing and information, to improving the design. Hope you enjoy this update!

MD5 Checksums

Windows (exe): 982433594e4f9b02294a5084f05a9f7b Linux (binary): fa67bf5de1218f505dd4595acac872f0 macOS (dmg): f837bbe12782c54ee4c64dc34e4e47ea Linux ARM64 (binary): f382a141d83858933671a797d85a70da

entry.title: New release for auto-mcs: v2.2.3
entry.content:
Welcome to auto-mcs v2.2.3! This version is a quality of life and stability overhaul from v2.2.1/v2.2.2. Some of the new features include:

  • Added support for Quilt & NeoForge
  • Stability improvements to Discord rich presence
  • Telepath stability improvements
  • Bugfixes and security enhancements

I am grateful to the community who has helped to improve this project with either suggestions, provided testing and information, to improving the design. Hope you enjoy this update!

entry.title: New release for auto-mcs: v2.2.4
entry.content:
Welcome to auto-mcs v2.2.4! This version is a stability overhaul from v2.2.1-v2.2.3. Some of the fixes include:

  • Fixes to Discord rich presence
  • Telepath stability improvements
  • Fixes to importing and updating servers
  • Translation improvements
  • A large amount of bugfixes for stability

I am grateful to the community who has helped to improve this project with either suggestions, provided testing and information, to improving the design. Hope you enjoy this update!

entry.title: New release for auto-mcs: v2.2.5
entry.content:
Welcome to auto-mcs v2.2.5! This version is a stability and amscript overhaul from v2.2.4. Some of the fixes include:

  • Overhaul to amscript engine for stability
  • Added a variety of scripts with the new amscript features
  • Added code folding and improved search to the amscript IDE
  • Overall stability improvements
  • Fixes to importing and updating servers
  • A large amount of bugfixes

I am grateful to the community who has helped to improve this project with either suggestions, provided testing and information, to improving the design. Hope you enjoy this update!

entry.title: New release for auto-mcs: v2.2.6
entry.content:
Welcome to auto-mcs v2.2.6! This version is a stability fix for v2.2.5. Some of the fixes include:

  • Fixed Paper not getting version
  • Fixed crash from migrating from Vanilla
  • Fixed Linux ARM and Docker not launching in some situations
  • Fixed modpack import engine
  • Fixed multiple crashes from the UI
  • Added import command to headless

I am grateful to the community who has helped to improve this project with either suggestions, provided testing and information, to improving the design. Hope you enjoy this update!
